    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_109350</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Resistance of metals</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Widerstand der Metalle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Résistance des métaux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Resistência dos metais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Resistenza dei metalli</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντίσταση των μετάλλων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Resistencia de metales</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates how ion vibrations and impurity atoms block the movement of electrons causing an increase in resistance at higher temperatures.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">conduction electrons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">currents</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">flow</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">impurity atoms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ion vibrations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Metals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">resistance</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie Ionenerschütterungen 
und -verunreinigung Atome die Bewegung der Elektronen blocken, die 
eine Zunahme des Widerstandes bei den höheren Temperaturen 
verursachen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre comment les atomes 
de vibrations et d'impureté d'ion bloquent le mouvement des 
électrons causant une augmentation de résistance à températures 
élevées.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra como os átomos das 
vibrações e da impureza do íon obstruem o movimento dos elétrons 
que causam um aumento na resistência em umas mais altas temperaturas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra come gli atomi di 
vibrazioni e dell'impurità dello ione ostruiscono il movimento degli 
elettroni che causano un aumento nella resistenza alle più alte 
temperature.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει πώς οι ιονικές 
δονήσεις και τα άτομα ακαθαρσιών εμποδίζουν τη μετακίνηση των 
ηλεκτρονίων προκαλώντας μια αύξηση στην αντίσταση στις υψηλότερες
θερμοκρασίες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra cómo los átomos de 
las vibraciones y de la impureza del ion bloquean el movimiento de los
electrones que causan un aumento en resistencia en temperaturas más 
altas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übertragung Elektronen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ströme</string>
          </keyword>
